title: 12: 1-800-SLOOT
description:
Welcome to the Sloot Hotline! For the first time EVER Sofia invites listeners to call in for advice and tell their wildest stories. She also expectedly gets some angry callers roasting her and a surprise soundtrack! This is a safe space and everyone is accepted, just make sure you’re drunk dialing the Sloot Hotline tonight and not your ex! 

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/ 

Episode promo codes: 
Hello Fresh: HelloFresh.com/SOFIA10
DHM Detox (No Days Wasted): NoDaysWasted.co/SOFIA
Better Help: Betterhelp.com/SOFIA
Calm: Calm.com/SOFIA
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
